{% extends "doc/layouts/endpoint.html" %} {% block link_target_title %}field-create{% endblock %} {% block link_target_request_tab %}field-create-request{% endblock %} {% block link_target_request_tab_pane %}field-create-request{% endblock %} {% block link_target_response_tab %}field-create-response{% endblock %} {% block link_target_response_tab_pane %}field-create-response{% endblock %} {% block title %} Create Field {% endblock %} {% block http_method %} {% include "doc/_http_method.html" with method="post" %} {% endblock %} {% block endpoint %} /api/visa/field/create/ {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% endblock %} {% block request %}

Payload: Field

Parameter Type Position # Description
label string body Required field name.
code_name string body Required short name of field.
kind int body Required type of field.
description string body Required description of field.
is_required boolean body Not Required Boolean value that shows required or not required .
is_required_error string body Not Required it shows the value when field is required and not filled.

Payload: Field Text

Parameter Type Position # Description
min_length integer body Required min length.
min_length_error string body Required error message.
max_length integer body Required max length.
max_length_error string body Required error message.
regex_chars string body Required list of chars that only allows.
regex_chars_error string body Required error message. 

    {
        'label': 'first name',
        'code_name': 'first_name',
        'kind': 1,
        'description': 'some information about this field.',
        'is_required': 1,
        'is_required_error': 'You must fill this field!',
        'min_length': '',
        'min_length_error': '',
        'max_length': 100,
        'max_length_error': '',
        'regex_chars': "[ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz-]+",
        'regex_chars_error': "no longer to approve special characters!"
    }

Payload: Field Date

Parameter Type Position # Description
max_kind integer body Required kind.
max_now_delta timedelta body Not Required error message.
max_date date body Not Required max length.
max_message string body Not Required error message.
min_kind integer body Required kind.
min_now_delta timedelta body Not Required error message.
min_date date body Not Required min length.
min_message string body Not Required error message. 

    {
        'label': 'first name',
        'code_name': 'first_name',
        'kind': 2,
        'description': 'some information about this field.',
        'is_required': 1,
        'is_required_error': 'You must fill this field!',
        'max_kind': 2,
        'max_now_delta': '',
        'max_date': '',
        'max_date_error': "Must be less then current date!",
        'min_kind': 1,
        'min_now_delta': '',
        'min_date': '',
        'min_date_error': '',
    }

Payload: Field Choice

Parameter Type Position # Description
label string body Required name that shows in select.
code_name string body Required code name that must be unique. 

    {
        'label': 'first name',
        'code_name': 'first_name',
        'kind': 3,
        'description': 'some information about this field.',
        'is_required': 1,
        'is_required_error': 'You must fill this field!',
        'options': [
            {
                "label": "Эрэгтэй",
                "code_name": "male1",
            },
            {
                "label": "Эмэгтэй",
                "code_name": "female1",
            },
        ],
    }
{% endblock request %} {% block response %}

Payload: Field Text


    {
        'is_success': True,
        'item': {
            'id': 1,
            'label': 'First Name',
            'code_name': 'first_name',
            'kind': 1,
            'description': 'some information about this field.',
            'is_required': 1,
            'is_required_error': 'You must fill this field!',
            'created_at': '2021-03-12 10:17',
            'updated_at': '2021-03-12 10:17',
            'min_length': '',
            'min_length_error': '',
            'max_length': 100,
            'max_length_error': '',
            'regex_chars': "[ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz-]+",
            'regex_chars_error': "no longer to approve special characters!"
        }
    }

Payload: Field Date


    {
        'is_success': True,
        'item': {
            'id': 2,
            'label': 'Birth Date',
            'code_name': 'birth_date',
            'kind': 2,
            'description': 'some information about this field.',
            'is_required': 1,
            'is_required_error': 'You must fill this field!',
            'created_at': '2021-03-12 10:17',
            'updated_at': '2021-03-12 10:17',
            'max_kind': 2,
            'max_now_delta': '',
            'max_date': '',
            'max_message': "Must be less then current date!",
            'min_kind': 1,
            'min_now_delta': '',
            'min_date': '',
            'min_message': '',
        }
    }

Payload: Field Choice


    {
        'is_success': True,
        'item': {
            'id': 3,
            'label': 'Birth Date',
            'code_name': 'birth_date',
            'kind': 3,
            'description': 'some information about this field.',
            'is_required': 1,
            'is_required_error': 'You must fill this field!',
            'created_at': '2021-03-12 10:17',
            'updated_at': '2021-03-12 10:17',
            'options': {
                [
                    {
                        'id': 1
                        "label": "new label",
                        "code_name": "male",

                        "id": 2
                        "label": "Female",
                        "code_name": "female",
